import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Col, Row, Container, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { ProductDetailsAction } from '../Actions/ProductDetailsAction' import Loader from '../Components/Loader' import Message from '../Components/Message' import axios from 'axios' function ProductsScreen({ match }) { // const dispatch = useDispatch() // const {loading,product,error} = useSelector(state=>state.ProductDetails) // useEffect(() => { // dispatch(ProductDetailsAction(match.params.id)) // }, [dispatch,match]); // console.log(product) const fet= async()=>{ const res = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) console.log(res) } fet() return ( <> {loading ?
:error?: {product.name} = 0.5 ? "fas fa-star" : product.rating > 0 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 1.5 ? "fas fa-star" : product.rating > 1 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 2.5 ? "fas fa-star" : product.rating > 2 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 3.5 ? "fas fa-star" : product.rating > 3 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> = 4.5 ? "fas fa-star" : product.rating > 4 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star"}`}> {` `}{product.numReviews} reviews Price : {product.price} $ description : {product.description} Price {product.price} $ Status {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Disabled"} 0 ? false : true} style={{ textAlign: 'center' }}> } ) } export default ProductsScreen
